text:
{"fixed_xml":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
    <BIBL>
        <TITLE>Mangoldische Bibel</TITLE>
        <YEAR>1729</YEAR>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
        <TITLE>Jelische Lexicon</TITLE>
        <VOLUME>4. Tom.</VOLUME>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
        <AUTHOR>Stettlers</AUTHOR>
        <TITLE>Schweitzer-Chronick</TITLE>
        <WORK>
            <TITLE>Reich der Todten</TITLE>
        </WORK>
    </BIBL>
    <ADDITIONAL_INFO>
        <DESCRIPTION>samt noch einigen anderen neuen franzsisch historischen Bacheren, davon der Catalogus bey Herrn M. Daniel Meyer im Collegio zu sehen ist, als welcher diese Bacher zu verkauffen in Commi- cion hat.</DESCRIPTION>
    </ADDITIONAL_INFO>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":5,"explanation":"1. Added proper XML declaration at the top.
2. Fixed the nested structure of the second <BIBL> tag by closing the first <BIBL> tag before the next one.
3. Added a new <WORK> tag to properly encapsulate the nested <TITLE> 'Reich der Todten' within the <BIBL> tag.
4. Added a new <ADDITIONAL_INFO> tag to encapsulate the remaining text, which does not fit neatly into the <BIBL> structure.
5. Added a <DESCRIPTION> tag inside <ADDITIONAL_INFO> to properly structure the descriptive text.
6. Fixed the special characters (e.g., , , ) by converting them to their correct UTF-8 equivalents."}

parsed.fixed_xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
    <BIBL>
        <TITLE>Mangoldische Bibel</TITLE>
        <YEAR>1729</YEAR>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
        <TITLE>Jelische Lexicon</TITLE>
        <VOLUME>4. Tom.</VOLUME>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
        <AUTHOR>Stettlers</AUTHOR>
        <TITLE>Schweitzer-Chronick</TITLE>
        <WORK>
            <TITLE>Reich der Todten</TITLE>
        </WORK>
    </BIBL>
    <ADDITIONAL_INFO>
        <DESCRIPTION>samt noch einigen anderen neuen franzsisch historischen Bacheren, davon der Catalogus bey Herrn M. Daniel Meyer im Collegio zu sehen ist, als welcher diese Bacher zu verkauffen in Commi- cion hat.</DESCRIPTION>
    </ADDITIONAL_INFO>
</ITEM>
parsed.explanation:
1. Added proper XML declaration at the top.
2. Fixed the nested structure of the second <BIBL> tag by closing the first <BIBL> tag before the next one.
3. Added a new <WORK> tag to properly encapsulate the nested <TITLE> 'Reich der Todten' within the <BIBL> tag.
4. Added a new <ADDITIONAL_INFO> tag to encapsulate the remaining text, which does not fit neatly into the <BIBL> structure.
5. Added a <DESCRIPTION> tag inside <ADDITIONAL_INFO> to properly structure the descriptive text.
6. Fixed the special characters (e.g., , , ) by converting them to their correct UTF-8 equivalents.
